conclusion: The graph is symmetric about a vertical dashed line.
The velocity starts at a positive value, decreases to zero, becomes negative, and then returns to the initial positive value at time \\( t_1 \\).
The particle is moving forward but slowing down until it momentarily stops.
The particle moves backward, reaches a point, and then moves forward again.
The particle passes through a certain position three times within the interval \\( 0 \\) to \\( t_1 \\).
The particle moves forward, slows down to stop, moves backward, and then moves forward again, crossing the same position three times due to the symmetric nature of the velocity changes.
